plugin.name: ogg
plugin.description: ogg stream manipulation (info about ogg: http://xiph.org)

element.name: oggaviparse
element.description: parse an ogg avi stream into pages (info about ogg: http://xiph.org)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: oggdemux
element.description: demux ogg streams (info about ogg: http://xiph.org)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: oggmux
element.description: mux ogg streams (info about ogg: http://xiph.org)
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

element.name: oggparse
element.description: parse ogg streams into pages (info about ogg: http://xiph.org)
element.author: Michael Smith <msmith@fluendo.com>

element.name: ogmaudioparse
element.description: parse an OGM audio header and stream
